III. Laboratory investigations
Th e following laboratory investigations can be carried out at the facilities indicated below:
At the SC:
/circle6 Pregnancy detection test
/circle6 Haemoglobin estimation
/circle6 Urine test to assess the presence of sugar and proteins
/circle6 Rapid malaria test
At the PHC/CHC/FRU:
/circle6 Blood group, including Rh factor
/circle6 VDRL/RPR
/circle6 HIV tes
